  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber">NfaTranscriber</a></>}>
The internal class that maintains all possible paths through an NFA based on a path through the DFA. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><Highlight kind="comment">//===-- Automaton.h - Support for driving TableGen-produced DFAs ----------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements class that drive and introspect deterministic finite-</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// state automata (DFAs) as generated by TableGen&#39;s -gen-automata backend.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a description of how to define an automaton, see</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// include/llvm/TableGen/Automaton.td.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One important detail is that these deterministic automata are created from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (potentially) nondeterministic definitions. Therefore a unique sequence of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// input symbols will produce one path through the DFA but multiple paths</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// through the original NFA. An automaton by default only returns &quot;accepted&quot; or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;not accepted&quot;, but frequently we want to analyze what NFA path was taken.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finding a path through the NFA states that results in a DFA state can help</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// answer &#42;what&#42; the solution to a problem was, not just that there exists a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// solution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;AUTOMATON&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;AUTOMATON&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Forward define the pair type used by the automata transition info tables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Experimental results with large tables have shown a significant (multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// orders of magnitude) parsing speedup by using a custom struct here with a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// trivial constructor rather than std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;tuple(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a415a4de1e497047a0bc1ac62755cdb5a">FromDfaState</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#ae2d65c817c3b204cf7dd21b67e7d00f7">ToDfaState</a>) &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The internal class that maintains all possible paths through an NFA based</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on a path through the DFA.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9">NfaTranscriber</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Cached transition table. This is a table of NfaStatePairs that contains</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// zero-terminated sequences pointed to by DFA transitions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TransitionInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A simple linked-list of traversed states that can have a shared tail. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// traversed path is stored in reverse order with the latest state as the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// head.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">PathSegment &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t State;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">    PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We allocate segment objects frequently. Allocate them upfront and dispose</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// at the end of a traversal rather than hammering the system allocator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specificbumpptrallocator">SpecificBumpPtrAllocator&lt;PathSegment&gt;</a> Allocator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Heads of each tracked path. These are not ordered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::deque&lt;PathSegment &#42;&gt; Heads;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The returned paths. This is populated during getPaths.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;NfaPath, 4&gt;</a> Paths;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a new segment and return it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  PathSegment &#42;makePathSegment(uint64&#95;t State, PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = Allocator.Allocate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = &#123;State, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Pairs defines a sequence of possible NFA transitions for a single DFA</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// transition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> transition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> Pairs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over all existing heads. We will mutate the Heads deque during</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumHeads = Heads.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumHeads; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      PathSegment &#42;Head = Heads&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The sequence of pairs is sorted. Select the set of pairs that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transition from the current head state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa81eb67f09ee4944eaeeddbc54c0c0de">lower&#95;bound</a>(Pairs, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a>&#123;Head-&gt;State, 0ULL&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PE = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4b7d2ab11554bd10d15b6cb21b2c2787">upper&#95;bound</a>(Pairs, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a>&#123;Head-&gt;State, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For every transition from the current head state, add a new path</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// segment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; PI != PE; ++PI)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PI-&gt;FromDfaState == Head-&gt;State)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">          Heads.push&#95;back(makePathSegment(PI-&gt;ToDfaState, Head));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now we&#39;ve iterated over all the initial heads and added new ones,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dispose of the original heads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    Heads.erase(Heads.begin(), std::next(Heads.begin(), NumHeads));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9">NfaTranscriber</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TransitionInfo)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      : TransitionInfo(TransitionInfo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49">reset</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#af6ccee9b562b94ba3372ddfaed335cda"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#af6ccee9b562b94ba3372ddfaed335cda">getTransitionInfo</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TransitionInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49">reset</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    Paths.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    Heads.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    Allocator.DestroyAll();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The initial NFA state is 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    Heads.push&#95;back(makePathSegment(0ULL, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#ac4c21ecdcd8d6aa8735d3dc78c4d7a9e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#ac4c21ecdcd8d6aa8735d3dc78c4d7a9e">transition</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TransitionInfoIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndIdx = TransitionInfoIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TransitionInfo&#91;EndIdx&#93;.ToDfaState != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++EndIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> Pairs(&amp;TransitionInfo&#91;TransitionInfoIdx&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 EndIdx - TransitionInfoIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    transition(Pairs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#aa3f872f94eff26283d42e942d703b39d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaPath&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#aa3f872f94eff26283d42e942d703b39d">getPaths</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    Paths.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Head : Heads) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c51673db3dd1c6d2088fc30224393d3">NfaPath</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Head-&gt;State != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.push&#95;back(Head-&gt;State);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">        Head = Head-&gt;Tail;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::reverse(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      Paths.push&#95;back(std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Paths;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace internal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A deterministic finite-state automaton. The automaton is defined in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TableGen; this object drives an automaton defined by tblgen-emitted tables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An automaton accepts a sequence of input tokens (&quot;actions&quot;). This class is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// templated on the type of these actions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ActionT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Map from &#123;State, Action&#125; to &#123;NewState, TransitionInfoIdx&#125;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// TransitionInfoIdx is used by the DfaTranscriber to analyze the transition.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// FIXME: This uses a std::map because ActionT can be a pair type including</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// an enum. In particular DenseMapInfo&lt;ActionT&gt; must be defined to use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DenseMap here.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is a shared&#95;ptr to allow very quick copy-construction of Automata; this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// state is immutable after construction so this is safe.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">MapTy = std::map&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, ActionT&gt;, std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, unsigned&gt;&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;MapTy&gt; M;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An optional transcription object. This uses much more state than simply</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// traversing the DFA for acceptance, so is heap allocated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt; Transcriber;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The initial DFA state is 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t State = 1;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// True if we should transcribe and false if not (even if Transcriber is defined).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Transcribe;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create an automaton.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Transitions The Transitions table as created by TableGen. Note that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                    because the action type differs per automaton, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                    table type is templated as ArrayRef&lt;InfoT&gt;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param TranscriptionTable The TransitionInfo table as created by TableGen.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Providing the TranscriptionTable argument as non-empty will enable the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// use of transcription, which analyzes the possible paths in the original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// NFA taken by the DFA. NOTE: This is substantially more work than simply</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// driving the DFA, so unless you require the getPaths() method leave this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InfoT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;InfoT&gt;</a> Transitions,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TranscriptionTable = &#123;&#125;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TranscriptionTable.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">      Transcriber =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::make&#95;shared&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt;(TranscriptionTable);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    Transcribe = Transcriber != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    M = std::make&#95;shared&lt;MapTy&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Transitions)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Greedily read and cache the transition table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      M-&gt;emplace(std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.FromDfaState, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.Action),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">                 std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.ToDfaState, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.InfoIdx));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a9ade48998a5f4ef2d6c9b7ceecbe209d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a9ade48998a5f4ef2d6c9b7ceecbe209d">Automaton</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      : M(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.M), State(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.State), Transcribe(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcribe) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transcriber is not thread-safe, so create a new instance on copy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcriber)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      Transcriber = std::make&#95;shared&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcriber-&gt;getTransitionInfo());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reset the automaton to its initial state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a30f80f4c7e00f9a31b9d6e6221805b4d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a30f80f4c7e00f9a31b9d6e6221805b4d">reset</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    State = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Transcriber)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">      Transcriber-&gt;reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Enable or disable transcription. Transcription is only available if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// TranscriptionTable was provided to the constructor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ab475bbd3819025a90bd009e18988bb40"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ab475bbd3819025a90bd009e18988bb40">enableTranscription</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a2faec1f9f8cc7f8f40d521c4dd574f49">Enable</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Transcriber &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Transcription is only available if TranscriptionTable was provided &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;to the Automaton constructor&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    Transcribe = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a2faec1f9f8cc7f8f40d521c4dd574f49">Enable</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Transition the automaton based on input symbol A. Return true if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// automaton transitioned to a valid state, false if the automaton</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// transitioned to an invalid state.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this function returns false, all methods are undefined until reset() is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#aa2620d2287c9bf8cd15da84914af65e2"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#aa2620d2287c9bf8cd15da84914af65e2">add</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ActionT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = M-&gt;find(&#123;State, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">    State = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
